case.title: Anyone like to go for a drink in Camden tonight? :) - 28 (London)
case.text:
As it says really! Had planned to spend the evening working, but I've been working indoors all day and would love to get out to a nice beer garden for a drink or two. It would be lovely to have some charming and witty male company- if you fit the bill, get in touch!
I am 28, blonde with a ready smile. Not into one night stands, just want a relaxed fun couple of hours, and if there's any spark we could take it from there!
